permission.name: ui.access
permission.summary: Allow access to the Web UI
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to login and access the web user interface

permission.name: ui.config.view
permission.summary: Allow access to view basic check configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view basic check configuration, this does not include check command configuration.

permission.name: ui.view.config-all
permission.summary: Allow access to view all check configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view all check configuration, including sensitive data.

permission.name: ui.view.stats
permission.summary: Allow access to view check statistics
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view statistics about a check

permission.name: ui.view.stats.transitions
permission.summary: Allow access to view check state transitions
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view state transitions for a check

permission.name: ui.read.comments
permission.summary: Allow access to view check comments
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view comments on a check

permission.name: ui.write.comments
permission.summary: Allow access to add check comments
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to add comments to a check

permission.name: ui.read.downtime
permission.summary: Allow access to view check downtime
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view downtime on a check

permission.name: ui.write.downtime
permission.summary: Allow access to add check downtime
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to add downtime to a check

permission.name: ui.sign.agent
permission.summary: Allow signing of Bergamot Agent certificates
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to sign Bergamot Agent certificates

permission.name: ui.generate.agent
permission.summary: Allow generation of Bergamot Agent configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to generate Bergamot Agent configuration
